description: Erection of rear roof extension and four rooflights to front elevation and replacement of part front and rear windows.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning insert date of original planning permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size and colour.</p><p><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">

REASON: Visual amenity in accordance with</span><span style="text-align: justify; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span lang="EN-NZ" style="text-align: justify; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">policies LP1 on ‘Design Quality &nbsp;from the ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">Hackney: A Place for Everyone: Local Plan’ 2033’&nbsp;</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">2020 and guidance contained within Hackney Councils SPD entitled ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">Residential Extensions and Alterations’</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;2009 and the ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">NPPF’</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;2019 (as amended).</span></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; font-size: medium; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; text-align: justify;"><span lang="EN-NZ" style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p>All new windows in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing windows in respect of materials used, detailed executi<span style="font-size: 14px;">on and finished appearance.

</span></p><p><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">REASON: Visual amenity in accordance with</span><span style="text-align: justify; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span><span lang="EN-NZ" style="text-align: justify; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">policies LP1 on ‘Design Quality &nbsp;from the ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">Hackney: A Place for Everyone: Local Plan’ 2033’&nbsp;</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">2020 and guidance contained within Hackney Councils SPD entitled ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">Residential Extensions and Alterations’</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;2009 and the ‘</span><i><span style="font-size: 14px;">NPPF’</span></i><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;2019 (as amended).</span></span></p>
